formElement.documentation: List of the space-separated tasks to execute. e.g. ':mySubproject:taskName clean build' or 'build'
formElement.label: Tasks:

formElement.documentation: Additional swithes for the gradle command, separated by semicolon. e.g. '-Poption1=value1;--no-daemon'
formElement.label: Options:

formElement.documentation: Specify this if you need directory to be different from the job workspace
formElement.label: Workspace Dir:

formElement.documentation: If checked, gradlew executable will be used.
formElement.label: Use Wrapper?:

formElement.documentation: If checked, gradle log will be saved to /myJob/gradleStdOut and /myJob/gradleStdErr property
formElement.label: Save Log?:
